head.title: Site B: Raptor tribal conflict by RAPHTOR on DeviantArt

meta.name: description
meta.content: As soon as a pack of Tiger striped male raptors (Wu's 1st genetic variant) seeking new territory found their way to the northern interior of Isla Sorna,... Site B: Raptor tribal conflict

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Art, Digital Art, Photography, Traditional Art, Community Art, Contemporary Art, Modern Art, Skins, Themes, Poetry, Prose, Applications, Wallpapers, Online Art, fanart, digital, painting, movies

As soon as a pack of Tiger striped male raptors (Wu's 1st genetic variant) seeking new territory found their way to the northern interior of Isla Sorna, they encountered a second tribe of raptors. ...

Site B: Raptor tribal conflict by RAPHTOR

div.span:
Fan Art
/
Digital Art
/
Painting & Airbrushing
/
Movies & TV

div.div:
As soon as a pack of Tiger striped male raptors (Wu's 1st genetic variant) seeking new territory found their way to the northern interior of Isla Sorna, they encountered a second tribe of raptors. These raptors look radically different, being more bird-like with males sporting quills as a Mohawk and females being lighter in color.
Despite being somewhat less aggressive than the tiger striped variants these raptors will fight fiercely for their turf in the same way they never stopped hunting down the human intruders when they took their precious eggs.
--------
Out of all the JP raptor designs the JPIII variants are my favorite....

In “real life” there should have been feathers, I think … but who will proof?

strange that this ended up back on the whats hot page
than again that page is only for reviving interest in old artwork
so cool
Nice

div.div: Such an epic battle

wow they look so good can you give me some tips please

div.div: ah jurassic park how i miss them old days, an good job!

up to I looked at the paycheck 4 $4498 , I have faith that...my... sister was actually earning money in their spare time on their laptop. . there brothers friend haz done this 4 only about seventeen months and at present cleared the depts on there cottage and bourt a great audi . more info here
..............
------------------>> url.ie/126t2
The lighting on this piece is amazing!
The description feels like straight out of Crichton's books.
AWESOME

SCREAM's
i need to learn to draw Raptors, I have a utahraptor OC and a few others yet I don't know how to draw em hehe DX This is beautiful !!! I love the colors AHH!
I drew something once with the help of a youtube video haha on how to draw Blue from Jurassic World ^^" It helped but only from one angle.
Still gosh, this is amazing artwork.
This is amazing!
wow, i could never do that, that's awweeessssooommmeee!!!!!!!
could you make one that fits my user name? lol awesome work love it

as Pamela explained I cant believe that any one able to make $5109 in a few weeks on the computer . have a peek here
..........
-------------- url.ie/126t7
Amazing art!!
This is just awesome, the movement, colours, everything it's just wonderful. And I love a good dip into Jurassic Park lore n__n Fantastic painting!
cool
Nice!
Oh my, this looks very tense and amazing all at once. I love it! I imagine seeing this in a museum
Even the raptors had race wars, we arent alone..
very nice
This is amazing! I love dinosaurs so much, especially raptors!! eeeee this work is remarkable!
Great!
I feel like there should be more about this...
Maravilloso!
Awesome work
Cooooooooooooooooooool
so cool!
It is sooooo cooool!
Holy crap this is awesome!
this is just awesome
Really really rad. I love the composition and lighting.
Absolutely love this. Great work!

I love dinosaurs
since I was a kid... just imagine that
A cool piece of Jurassic Park fanart~! I love it!

div.div: It looks to be one of those ancient tickle fights i've read about in our history books
looks like somthing id find on a MTG card
This looks like a canvas painting even though you painted it digitally. I love the rustic tangibility of it, it makes it feel immersive.
Man, you're AWESOME. Can you check my devations? i draw some dinossaurs too :v
Awesome!
